mapper.select: select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, H.*, DATE_FORMAT(H.history_date, '%Y') AS year, DATE_FORMAT(H.history_date, '%c') AS month from history H,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP order by history_date;
select distinct DATE_FORMAT(history_date, '%Y') AS year from history order by history_date desc;
select distinct DATE_FORMAT(history_date, '%Y') AS year, DATE_FORMAT(history_date, '%c') AS month from history order by history_date desc;
mapper.insert: insert into history (history_date, content, img_url) values (#{historyDate}, #{content}, #{imgUrl})
mapper.update: update history set history_date = #{historyDate}, content = #{content}, img_url = #{imgUrl} where history_no = #{historyNo}
